tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Hilarious (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Professor Natalizia is a very interesting professor. He starts every class with a joke. And if you happen to come late you\'d better expect to hear said joke. He is a fair grader and an understanding teacher. He does offer extra credit if you go to the writing lab.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Hilarious (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Respected (1)
stu_tags: EXTRA CREDIT  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  LOTS OF HOMEWORK
comments: Awesome professor! Never ever left class without learning anything. He is very engaging by taking material thats relatable to a typical college student. Try not to miss his lectures -- he has lots of in class assignments.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Hilarious (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Respected (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  HILARIOUS  SO MANY PAPERS
comments: Great professor. He was very funny, corny humor, but always made you smile. Very fair and a great grader. The lectures were always interesting and engaging. Expect papers though, he dishes out quite a bit of them. Would absolutely take his class again. Just try not to miss class, you\'ll miss a lot.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Hilarious (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Does stupid groupwork every day. You can NOT skip once, you will miss out on repetitive busywork which is counted towards your final grade. Although he is very smart and helpful, the class is just a very medicore style of work. Also, gives ALOT of essays, VERY writing intensive, and grades them rigidly.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Hilarious (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Respected (1)
comments: He is really cool professor I\'ve ever had. He kept every class interesting, and I felt the class time is too short because I enjoyed his class. He is very helpful man. I learned a lot in his class, and I also know how to develop my literacy. His class is not too easy to go, but it is definitely the best professor to improve your English.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Hilarious (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Respected (1)
comments: He is extremely nice and easy going. He definitely makes the class fun. He actually gives quite a bit of work and i have him for literary genres. Great professor and class. You NEED to go to his class in order to receive a high grade. If not its pretty easy to fail.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Hilarious (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Respected (1)
comments: He is very energetic and makes the classes fun! He is a very easy grader and he makes it very easy for you to get easy points in class. He is deffently my favorite teacher yet.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Hilarious (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Professor Natalizia\'s class is very enjoyable. He always shows really cool clips online and keeps you interested. But deff show up if you want to recieve little grades that help you towards the end!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Hilarious (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Professor Natalizia is a very helpful man. He loves his class and tries his best to make his students work hard. He also is a nice grader if you are willing to put the effort into the class. The only negative portion of the class was that there were too many works. Sometimes it was stressful but later I realized it helped.Take him if you can.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Hilarious (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Great Professor! My favorite of the english professors at jwu. He tells you when papers are going to be due weeks ahead of time so you have enough time to do them. there is peer edits and he will review ur paper if u aren\'t sure if u r doing it right. So helpful! So nice! and not bad to look at! He made english fun!

comments: GREAT PROFESSORS! i hate english and he actually had me really get into it! def an easy grade if you do your work! show up to class and do all of your assignments and your golden! he has such a great attitude and never is dull, always keeps you interested!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Hilarious (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Prof Natalizia is one of my favorite professors! He\'s funny and uses multiple fun examples to help you understand concepts. He literally gives you so many chances to get an A. Take him whenever you can!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Hilarious (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Respected (1)
comments: He Literally is the best teacher and my favorite! hes so helpful too! if you are picking classes you HAVEEE to take it with him!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Hilarious (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Great Professor. His high energy and corny jokes make class enjoyable. I am not a fan of English classes and I did like this class. There is quite a bit of "busy work" but all is easily relatable to what he is teaching. He is very informative and easy to follow. I would most definitely take another of his classes and would recommend him to anyone.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Hilarious (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Respected (1)
comments: His energy is very high! His a great teacher and he really does know how to keep students attention. He does seem to give lots of busy work but his group work assignments help everyone to get to know one another. I hate public speaking but I would take his class again anyday!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Hilarious (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Respected (1)
comments: The class was not bad, but usually I felt like he would just give us a lot of busy work. We would sometimes watch clips from stuff so at least it wasn\'t extremely boring. For some reason the final project was about marketing and not really about English at all. He was nice overall though and never seemed angry or rude.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Hilarious (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Very easy class had to write four papers he doesn\'t grade the easiest but you can rewrite your paper as many times as you want until you get an A. He gives easy fun assignments in class and uses Youtube and movies to give relevant examples of what he is talking about.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Hilarious (2)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Respected (1)
comments: this guy is great! always tries to make his class fun and interesting.. not the easiest grader, but will let you keep revising your paper until you get the grade you want. he uses current examples to keep everyone motivated. take his class its great!
